body:
With guile 2.0 the naming scheme of the library has changed and libmatheval will not build against it.
Previous builds may have worked if a local guile@1.X version was installed.

I patch the configure.in of libmatheval using the appropriate guile macros.
An empty config.rpath has been added (seems obligatory for autotools).
In the package file the patch is applied and an autoreconf is forced if guile@2.0:
title: fix to build libmatheval with guile@2.0:
